Header.title: EDucated Guess
Header.paragraph: No job is too small, so please take a look at the services offered and give me a call.

paragraph: I am a registered professional engineer with over 40 years in the manufacturing industry in executive positions.  I have been a handyman for most of my career, doing various basement renovations, bathroom renovations etc.  I have recently managed a complete renovation of a hair salon, undertaking a majority of the work myself (see the Gallery tab).  I have also upgraded my mother's house for resale recently, achieving an offer price far above asking.
In an attempt to help seniors stay in place, I am focusing my services to the seniors community, and offering my services for $40 per hour, plus. expenses (as approved) and HST.
Educated Guess is the "operating as" name for the Ontario incorporated company Blackburn Development Corporation.
Educated Guess has a $2 million general liability insurance policy in place, so that we are all protected.

Services.name: Laundry Room Upgrades (cabinets, sinks, flooring etc)
Power Wash and Stain Decks and Fences
Tire Replacement on Site (Winter and Summer Tires on Rims)

Testimonials.text: Ed was the perfect addition to our open, as we could have never done it without him. With having no idea where to start with the renovations, he effortlessly managed beginning to end. From coordinating and assembling our furniture deliveries, to managing our plumbing and electrical trades - there was no task he couldnâ€™t handle. We even had a surprise leak that he fixed, leaving us with a worry-free mindset. We absolutely recommend Ed and will absolutely work with him for future maintenance of our space as he has always been reliable, trustworthy and efficient.
Testimonials.name: Erin and Julie - Owners of The Fawn Collective, hair lounge, Waterloo

Testimonials.text: Very pleased with his professionalism and the quality of Ed's work.  Happy to recommend -- great service and helped us find ideas that worked in our space. High-quality work, very reasonable prices, did an excellent job.
Testimonials.name: Patti, Stratford

Testimonials.text: I was in that "end of a renovation" state when Ed showed up to help me with all of the finishing touches. It really helped me settle in and made the house functional again.
Testimonials.name: Susan, Stratford

Testimonials.text: In 2018 I needed some major renovations done to my condo and Ed was the handyman who did it all.   I found him to be conscientious, professional and knowledgeable.    I wouldn't hesitate to use him again or recommend him to my friends.
Testimonials.name: Diane, Paris
